T02TD2637E:224a-31: zhes dbab pa'i phyag rgyas slob ma'i snying gar dgrol lo //
T02TD2637E:224a-32: de nas shar phyogs kyi sgo la mngon par phyogs par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02TD2637E:224a-33: rang gi phyag rgyas slob ma rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs su bsams la rang gi phyag rgya chen pos zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhag ste /
T02TD2637E:224a-34: mchod yon bstabs te dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod de gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pa dang dung dang rol mo la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyis mchod do //
T02TD2637E:224a-35: de nas bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa la sogs pas mngon par dga' bar bya zhing dang por re zhig chu'i dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2637E:224b-0: de nas phreng ba la sogs pa @224b bcu dang /
T02TD2637E:224b-1: rdo rje dril bu dang rin po che bdun dang rgyud las 'byung ba ltar rim pas bskur ro //
T02TD2637E:224b-2: de yang rje btsun gyi rim pa nyid du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2637E:224b-3: bdag gis de ltar ltos pas ma bris so //
T02TD2637E:224b-4: dbang bskur ba'i rjes la spos la sogs pas mchod /
T02TD2637E:224b-5: sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis mchod la dbang gzhan bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2637E:224b-6: de nas slob dpon gyis kyang yi ge brgya pa bton la ting nge 'dzin de bzhin du gsal la /
T02TD2637E:224b-7: shing la sngags kyi rgyal po mang du bzlas la ro rig pa'i me tog tu bsams la dor ba'am yang na snga ma bzhin du gdan dang bcas pa rgyan kyang rang gi lha bzhin du bsams la mchod pa'am yang na gang du yang mi bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2637E:224b-8: de nas nub phyogs su ku sha'i gdan la gnas te kha shar du bltas te sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2637E:224b-9: rdzas mar khu dang mngar gsum dang yam shing lo ma can dang dri zhim pa las byas pa sor brgyad dam /
T02TD2637E:224b-10: sor bzhi nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bar dang /
T02TD2637E:224b-20: mar me dang dri dang bshos kun g-yas su gzhag go //
T02TD2637E:224b-21: zhabs bsil dang mchod yon g-yon du gzhag go //
T02TD2637E:224b-22: bud shing skam po gur kum gyis bsgos pa yang gzhag go //
T02TD2637E:224b-25: ga pur gur kum la sogs pa //
T02TD2637E:224b-26: mar dang 'o ma til bsgos la //
T02TD2637E:224b-27: til dang yungs kar 'bras rnams dang //
T02TD2637E:224b-28: dri yi chus ni legs bkang ste //
T02TD2637E:224b-29: 'bras chan spos dang sa tu ba //
T02TD2637E:224b-30: sbrang rtsi sha kar mngar ldan pa //
T02TD2637E:224b-31: zhes 'byung ste de nas dgang gzar dang blugs gzar dang phur bu dang tho ba dang gtor ma rnams bshad pa'i rgyud bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2637E:224b-33: dgang blugs tho ba phur pa rnams //
T02TD2637E:224b-34: zhi ba shin tu rtse mo dkar //
T02TD2637E:224b-35: dbyibs zlum dri yis bsgos par bya //
T02TD2637E:224b-36: dri zhim gzhon dang sa dkar las //
T02TD2637E:224b-37: skyes pa rab tu bsngags pa yin //
T02TD2637E:224b-39: rang rnal 'byor pa dang ldan pas yo byad la las thams cad pa dang ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags kyis btab bo //
T02TD2637E:225a-2: yam shing la yang de bzhin te //
T02TD2637E:225a-4: de nas ku sha la bkra shis kyi skyil mo krung du 'dug la /
T02TD2637E:225a-5: rdo rje chos kyi bzlas brjod byas pa'i chus thab kyi nye 'khor dang /
T02TD2637E:225a-6: yo byad thams cad bsangs nas rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gsal bar bya ste rgyun chags pa'i me'am /
T02TD2637E:225a-7: dka' thub dga' ba'i khyim nas blang pa'i me'am /
T02TD2637E:225a-8: rdo rje chos kyi bzlas brjod byas pa'i chus me bsangs te /
T02TD2637E:225a-9: bud shing la me sbar la las sna tshogs kyi snying po brjod cing /
T02TD2637E:225a-10: rlung g-yab kyis me sbar ro //
T02TD2637E:225a-11: de nas rang gi ting nge 'dzin gsal ba'i snying gar h'um bsams pa las h'um ngam ram las me lha bskyed de rdo rje me'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje bcing ba bsdams par byas pa'o //
T02TD2637E:225a-12: dam tshig gi sngags h'um aom badzra aa na la ma h'a bh'u ta dzva la bhasmi ku ru sarba dusht'a na h'um phat phat h'um /
T02TD2637E:225a-13: zhes brjod pas rdo rje me lha'i gzugs su gyur te ming pa ring ba la gzi mdangs chen po g-yas bgrang phreng /
T02TD2637E:225a-14: g-yon ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa thor tshugs ser por can lus po mdog dkar zhing zlum po //
T02TD2637E:225a-15: me lce stong gi dkrigs shing 'od 'bar bar bsams nas /
T02TD2637E:225a-16: lcags kyu la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pas sngags brjod do //
T02TD2637E:225a-17: aom badzra aagne aangku sha dza:/
T02TD2637E:225a-21: dgug pa dang gzhug cing dbang du bya'o //
T02TD2637E:225a-22: de nas mchod yon la sogs pa sngags kyis byin la zhi ba'i mthun pa'i dgang gzar gyis mar gyi dgang blugs gsum sbyin no //
T02TD2637E:225a-23: de nas mngar gsum dang bsreg shing thor to mar la bsdebs pa gsum bsreg pa dang /
T02TD2637E:225a-25: gung mo srin lag gsum gyis bskor zhing dbul lo //
T02TD2637E:225a-27: de yang bshad pa'i rgyud las 'byung bas bstod do //
T02TD2637E:225a-28: drang srong chen po khyed 'bar ba nyid du bzhugs te bdag nyid ji ltar 'dod kyis sbyin sreg byed kyi bar du gnas par gyis shig / ces smras nas me lha'i gzugs de nyid me'i rang bzhin 'bar ba nyid du gyur par bsam mo //
T02TD2637E:225a-30: de nas byin za dge ba ram sbar nas //
T02TD2637E:225a-31: me lce stong gis dkrigs shing 'bar ba'i lus//
T02TD2637E:225b-0: @225b zla dkar kunda bzhin la zhi ba'i lus //
T02TD2637E:225b-1: mtha' yas pa yi gzugs kyis me bkug la //
T02TD2637E:225b-2: aarga phul bar brtags nas de bzhin du //
T02TD2637E:225b-3: blo mchog ldan pa'i mdun du gzugs mchog gzhag / ces gsungs so //
T02TD2637E:225b-4: rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas pa'i yo byad g-yas g-yon du gzhag dgang gzar blugs gzar dang phur pa tho ba dang gtor ma mdun du gzhag / de nas khro bo h'um las bskyed pa dang rang bzhin dang gnyis su med par byas la mchod pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD2637E:225b-5: yang phrin las bcol bstod pa bya'o //
T02TD2637E:225b-6: de nas dkon mchog gsum spyan drang mchod pa'i rim pa yang bya bstod nas phrin las bcol gshegs su gsol /
T02TD2637E:225b-7: de nas lha so so la mchod pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD2637E:225b-8: de yang bshad pa'i rgyud las ji skad du /
T02TD2637E:225b-9: dang por me lha nyid la gsum //
T02TD2637E:225b-10: de nas khro bo khams gsum la //
T02TD2637E:225b-11: de 'og dkon mchog gsum la dbul //
T02TD2637E:225b-12: de nas lha rnams re re la //
T02TD2637E:225b-13: zhes gsungs pas de dang mthun par dbul /
T02TD2637E:225b-14: yang na me lha dang lha so so la'o //
T02TD2637E:225b-15: de nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal la'o //
T02TD2637E:225b-16: de nas me dag par byas la de'i nang du de rnams spyan drang bar bya ba dang gdan dbul ba dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa dbul ba dang sreg rdzas rim par dbul ba dang /
T02TD2637E:225b-17: las zhi bar bya ba'i las dang bstod pa dang gshegs su gsol ba dang phrin las bcol ba ma lus par bya'o //
T02TD2637E:225b-18: dkyil 'khor chen po nas spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol ba der bya'o //
T02TD2637E:225b-19: yang na rang lha'i rnal 'byor gsal bar byas la las sna tshogs pa'i snying po brjod pas me 'bar ba de nyid kyi nang du gzhal yas khang rgyan dang gdan du bcas pa bskyed la /
T02TD2637E:225b-20: de'i nang du rdo rje bsdu ba dang sgor phyogs pa dang nang du dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dgyes par bya ba byas la /
T02TD2637E:225b-21: de dag sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang bzhugs pa'i tshul la sogs pa so so'i lta bas yun ring du blta zhing bsam mo //
T02TD2637E:225b-22: de nas so so'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bca' so so'i sngags mjug la sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2637E:225b-23: zhes brjod pas 'phags pa rnams mnyes shing dam tshig bskang bar bsam mo //
T02TD2637E:226a-0: de dag la yang mchod pa'i rim @226a * //
T02TD2637E:226a-1: pa dang po zhabs bsil de nas zhal bsil te /
T02TD2637E:226a-3: de nas mchod pa brgyad dang nyi shu yang mi 'gal te nus na dbul /
T02TD2637E:226a-4: de nas sreg rdzas rnams la lha so so'i snying pho dang ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags bzlas te 'od zer dkar por gyur par bsams te bdag lha gnas rdzas la de ltar bsam mo //
T02TD2637E:226a-5: rdzas re re la yang aom buddha bee ro tsa na sv'a h'a /
T02TD2637E:226a-6: aom sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha ya sva /
T02TD2637E:226a-8: aom sh'akya mu na ye aom sarba tra tha /
T02TD2637E:226a-10: sang don sngags kyi mthar sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a btags la dbul lo //
T02TD2637E:226a-11: de yang dang por mar mngar gsum de nas yang shing lo ma sor bzhi pa rtsa ba sor gsum pa zlum po ga bur gur gum gyis bsgos pa dang /
T02TD2637E:226a-12: shing zho can dang dri zhim pa las byas pa sor bzhi pa'am brgyad pa'am nyi shu rtsa lnga man chad sbom phra sngags pa'i chang pa gang ngam yang na sor brgyad pa la so ral gri 'dra ba sor gsum zlum po dbul ba rtse mo mar la bsngos la gong ma'i rim pa bzhin dbul lo //
T02TD2637E:226a-13: de nas bzlas pa'i mthar ming 'di zhes bya ba'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib ba sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD2637E:226a-15: lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha re re la brgya rtsa brgyad dang nyi shu rtsa gcig dang gsum las nyung bar mi dbul lo //
T02TD2637E:226a-16: de nas bshad pa'i rgyud las 'byung ba'i tshogs dang zhes pa glu dang phur bus gdab pa dang tho ba'i las dang gtor ma dang srid ba zhi bar byed pa'i sngags kyang nus na bya'o //
T02TD2637E:226a-17: ma nus na bstod pa dang phrin las bcol gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD2637E:226a-19: glu dang phur bus gdab pa dang /
T02TD2637E:226a-20: tho ba zhi ba'i gtor ma dang //
T02TD2637E:226a-21: srid pa zhi byed sngags rnams ni //
T02TD2637E:226a-22: med na la sogs mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2637E:226a-24: yang bar du ming 'di zhes bya ba'i nyon mongs pa dang sgrib pa thams cad aom sarba p'a bam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2637E:226a-25: zhes brjod cing til bsreg go //
T02TD2637E:226a-26: de nas rdzogs pa dang yang me thab bsangs la lhag chad kyi don du gtso bo la sogs pa'i lha thams cad la brgya rtsa brgyad dbul lo //
T02TD2637E:226b-0: yang ngan song sbyong ba'i lha la sreg rdzas nyi shu rtsa @226b gcig phul nas tshul bzhin du gshegs su gsol de nas me lha me thab tu snang bar byas la mchod yon la sogs pa lan gsum du dbul lo //
T02TD2637E:226b-1: de yang rgyud las ji skad gsungs pa'i yon tan 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa de ltar spyan drangs la /
T02TD2637E:226b-2: aargha la sogs de bzhin du /
T02TD2637E:226b-3: bdar gshegs gsungs pa'i mchod pa gang yin bya //
T02TD2637E:226b-4: de nas bsreg bya gang ste rim gyis ni //
T02TD2637E:226b-5: brgya la sogs te brgya rtsa brgyad du brtag / de nas sbyong ba'i sngags kyis rgyal po'am //
T02TD2637E:226b-6: bsreg bya nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu brtag / de nas spyan drang yo byad lan gsum dang //
T02TD2637E:226b-7: aarga la sogs padma dkar zhal mchod //
T02TD2637E:226b-9: bsgrub par bya ba yang rgyud las //
T02TD2637E:226b-10: phyag na rdo rje padma zhags pa bsnams //
T02TD2637E:226b-11: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs //
T02TD2637E:226b-12: zhabs kyis padmar sdig mnan cing //
T02TD2637E:226b-13: rgyan rnams kun ni rab rdzogs pa //
T02TD2637E:226b-14: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dbu rgyan mtho //
T02TD2637E:226b-15: bsams sam yang na bris kyang rung //
T02TD2637E:226b-16: de yi snying po de bzhin du //
T02TD2637E:226b-17: brgya phrag stong ngam yang na ni //
T02TD2637E:226b-18: bye ba'i tshad du sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD2637E:226b-19: de ltar sgrub pa rje btsun gyis 'chad par blta'o //
T02TD2637E:226b-20: de ltar mi sgrub pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bsdu pa mdzad de /
T02TD2637E:226b-22: sngar bskyed pa rnams gsal bar byas la /
T02TD2637E:226b-23: de la mchod pa rnam pa brgyad kyis mchod la de nas ji ltar bsams shing spyan drangs pa'i lha rang gi lha la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dran pa'i spyod yul du byas te /
T02TD2637E:226b-24: legs par byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir //
T02TD2637E:226b-25: bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la yi ge brgya pas gsol ba gdab bo //
T02TD2637E:226b-26: de nas phyag rgya dgrol bar brtsams te chos kyi phyag rgya rdo rje lce las so //
T02TD2637E:226b-27: las kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur /
T02TD2637E:226b-28: sems dpa' chen po dam tshig gi phyag rgya las so //
T02TD2637E:226b-29: thams cad ni rdo rje bcing ba las so //
T02TD2637E:226b-30: phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje las so //
T02TD2637E:226b-31: phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag rgya zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pas so //
T02TD2637E:226b-32: rdo rje phyag rgya yang phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa'i snying po yi ge sgra las so //
T02TD2637E:226b-33: de yang zla ba las so //
T02TD2637E:227a-1: bdag med par mos pa las so //
T02TD2637E:227a-2: de yang rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya las so //
T02TD2637E:227a-3: de yang rdo rje bcings pa dral ba'i phyag rgya las so //
T02TD2637E:227a-4: rdo rje dral ba'i phyag rgya yang rdo rje bcing ba las so //
T02TD2637E:227a-5: de yang rdo rje thal mo las so //
T02TD2637E:227a-6: rdo rje thal mo rnam par smin pa'i lus su mos pa byas te /
T02TD2637E:227a-7: bdag dang mi gnyis par gyur pa'i dam tshig sems dpar mos pa btab ste de'i snying po badzra mu:/
T02TD2637E:227a-9: de nas aom badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa /
T02TD2637E:227a-10: zhes brjod cing snying gar rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya sngar bshad pa bcings la dpral bar gtugs te ;
T02TD2637E:227a-11: rdo rje khu tshur mdzub mo'i rtse mos mgo la bcing ba'i tshul du bya'o //
T02TD2637E:227a-12: de'i 'og tu sarba mu tra mee tri ku ru ba ra ka ba tso na bam /
T02TD2637E:227a-13: zhes bya ba'i snying po brjod cing snga ma bzhin du go cha bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2637E:227a-14: go cha'i mtha' gnyis rna ba gnyis kyi steng du phyung ste dar sna 'phyang ba'i tshul du lag pa gnyis brkyang la gdab bo //
T02TD2637E:227a-15: brdab pa'i thal mo yang lag pa'i thal mo khong du sbyar ba las smad phye ba mgo mi 'byed par thal mo mnyam par brdab pa'i tshul du bya'o //
T02TD2637E:227a-16: aom badzra tu shya ho brjod do //
T02TD2637E:227a-17: de ltar phyag rgya rnams dgrol ba dang bcing ba dang mnyes par byas na rdo rje lta bur 'gyur ro ;
T02TD2637E:227a-18: / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa 'khor rnams ji ltar spyan drangs shing mdun du bsams pa rnams kyang rjes su dran par byas te /
T02TD2637E:227a-19: yang gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi dang /
T02TD2637E:227a-20: bdug pa la sogs pa brgyad kyis mchod nas /
T02TD2637E:227a-21: yang mchod pa byas te phyag byas nas /
T02TD2637E:227a-22: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bar bya'o //
T02TD2637E:227a-23: de nas rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas kha gyen du bstan te dgrol ba'i snying po 'di brjod do //
T02TD2637E:227a-24: aom tri to ba sarba sa tva aartha siddhi ra ta tva ya th'a nu ga ta gatstsha dha ma buddha bi sha yam pu na ram ga ma ya mu:/
T02TD2637E:227a-25: zhes pa de lta bus gshegs su gsol bar 'gyur ro ;
T02TD2637E:227a-26: / ji ltar bskyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor yid kyi sbyor bas rang gi lus la bcug la bsrung ba bya zhing nga rgyal bya'o //
T02TD2637E:227a-27: de ltar bsregs nas thal bar gyur pa dang /
T02TD2637E:227b-0: rdo rje bsdu ba'i sngags sam h'a ra na zhes brjod cing rus pa dang thal ba rnams bsdus nas snod @227b gtsang mar bcug ste mchod rten gdab pa'i sa phyogs su gzhag go //
T02TD2637E:227b-1: de nas ga bur la sogs pa dri'i chu dang ba'i 'o ma dang /
T02TD2637E:227b-4: gcin dang rus pa bsres te /
T02TD2637E:227b-5: ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags bzhi las gang yang rung ba'i 'bum bzlas la /
T02TD2637E:227b-6: dkyil 'khor gyi lha gang yang rung ba'i gzugs su gdab pa'am yang na mchod rten du byas te mchod rten gcig nas brgya'i bar du gzhung gzhan dang mthun par gdab bo //
T02TD2637E:227b-8: de nas thal bar gyur pa dang //
T02TD2637E:227b-9: rdo rje bsdu ba'i sngags kyis su //
T02TD2637E:227b-10: cho ga bzhin du bsdu bar bya //
T02TD2637E:227b-11: thal ba de yang dul ba'i rdul //
T02TD2637E:227b-12: sngags kyis btab pa'i dri chu dang //
T02TD2637E:227b-13: ba skyes 'o ma la sogs lngas //
T02TD2637E:227b-14: sbyong ba'i sngags kyis blo ldan gyis //
T02TD2637E:227b-15: 'bum du bzlas pa rdzogs nas ni //
T02TD2637E:227b-16: ga bur dri yis bsgos pa yis //
T02TD2637E:227b-17: 'jim pa dang ni bsres nas kyang //
T02TD2637E:227b-18: gzugs su byas pa'am yang na ni //
T02TD2637E:227b-19: mchod rten gyi ni ltar byas la //
T02TD2637E:227b-20: gcig gam gnyis sam gsum mam lnga //
T02TD2637E:227b-21: yang na brgya rtsa brgyad du bya //
T02TD2637E:227b-22: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te de yang shi ba'i don du ngan song las thar bar bya ba'i thabs rgyud las bstan par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2637E:227b-23: gong ma ltar byas pa'i yon tan yang rgyud las /
T02TD2637E:227b-24: de lta na ni sdig can yang //
T02TD2637E:227b-25: ngan song las ni thar bar 'gyur //
T02TD2637E:227b-26: dge ba'i chos ni bsdu ba dang //
T02TD2637E:227b-27: byang chub sa bon bskyed pa dang //
T02TD2637E:227b-28: sangs rgyas 'bras bu rgyu dang ldan //
T02TD2637E:227b-29: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin par ldan //
T02TD2637E:227b-30: tshul khrims rgyud dang rab ldan pa //
T02TD2637E:227b-31: bzod pa brtson 'grus phyin bzhag dang //
T02TD2637E:227b-32: shes rab rnams kyi rgyur sgom pa'o //
T02TD2637E:227b-33: 'jig rten bsod nams lta ci smos //
T02TD2637E:227b-34: myur du ngan song the tshom ni //
T02TD2637E:227b-35: bcom par 'gyur te the tshom med //
T02TD2637E:227b-36: ces pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD2637E:227b-37: de nas aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'adya nutpanna tv'ata ;
T02TD2637E:227b-38: ces zlos shing dkyil 'khor phyis la /
T02TD2637E:227b-39: dman ma la sogs pa chur dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2637E:227b-40: de nas phur pa yang gdon //
T02TD2637E:227b-41: de nas ru ru sphu ru dzva la tishtha siddha lo tsa na sarba aartha s'a dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2637E:228a-0: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i 'o mas phur bu dang gzugs brnyan thams cad bkru bar bya zhing khang bu @228a * //
T02TD2637E:228a-2: dkyil 'khor cho ga byas pa las //
T02TD2637E:228a-3: bdag gis dge ba gang bsags de'i //
T02TD2637E:228a-4: bde ba gnyis med dam pa de //
T02TD2637E:228a-5: 'jig rten kun gyis rtogs par shog /'phags pa rdo rje gtsug tor gyi rgyud las btus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon dharma k'irtis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2637E:228a-7: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po a'a ts'arya dharma p'a la dang zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis gtan la phab pa'o//
